Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball eclipsed the 30-point barrier for the fourth time this season
Grant Williams was assessed a flagrant-two foul and ejected after plowing over Jayson Tatum at midcourt
Pre-Game Insights: No Jaylen Brown, no problem for the deep Celtics
LaMelo Ball has to find a way to stay out of foul trouble
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick isn't fazed by Charles Barkley — or anyone — doubting the Lakers
Kirby Smart’s father, Sonny, died Saturday of complications from hip surgery after falling in New Orleans ahead of the Sugar Bowl
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics outrebound the Hornets 44-34 with Charlotte playing without its top two centers Mark Williams and Nick Richards
The Celtics beat the Hornets 113-103 for the second straight night at the Spectrum Center on Saturday
Others: Derrick White added 18 points and eight rebounds for the Celtics
Payton Pritchard had 22 points on six 3-pointers
Brandon Miller had 16 points in his return from a strained glute
